articles.title: Ceasefire hopes fade as Israel bombards Gaza, Lebanon - Reuters
articles.description: Prospects of a ceasefire between Israel and its foes Hamas and Hezbollah ran aground on Friday as Israeli airstrikes killed at least 64 people in the Gaza Strip, according to medics in the Palestinian enclave, and bombed Beirut's southern suburbs.
